Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.20708407]HIV-1:Inhibition of 3′-processing catalyzed by integrase(IC50=0.04 ± 0.01 µM);inhibition of strand transfer catalyzed by integrase(IC50=0.031± 0.01 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide acts antiviral activity by inhibiting the activity of integrase.
